summary: This bill, the "Equal Tax Act," aims to equalize the tax treatment of capital gains and earned income. Key provisions include limiting preferential rates for capital gains, treating gifts and inheritances as taxable events, allowing for installment payments of capital gains taxes on certain assets, and limiting like-kind exchanges for real estate gains. It introduces new information reporting requirements for certain gifts and modifies deductions for qualified business income. The changes primarily affect tax calculations and are effective starting in 2026.
